ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Tri-band GSM cell phone compatible with 900/1800/1900 frequencies and  GPRS/EDGE capabilities
Innovative swivel design, leather-inspired accents, and elegantly etched metal surfaces
1.3-megapixel camera;  digital audio player; 10 MB memory (no expansion); Bluetooth for handsfree devices
Up to 3 hours of talk time and 220 hours of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia 7370 Unlocked Cell Phone with Camera, Media Player--International Version with Warranty (Brown)
